name: cleanup index.lock
clean local files

env.GYP_DEFINES: OS=android component=static_library fastbuild=1 gomadir='[CACHE]/goma_client' target_arch=arm64 use_goma=1

name: calculate the number of recommended jobs

cmd:
import sys, os
path = sys.argv[1]
mode = int(sys.argv[2])
if not os.path.isdir(path):
  if os.path.exists(path):
    print "%s exists but is not a dir" % path
    sys.exit(1)
  os.makedirs(path, mode)
name: preprocess_for_goma.makedirs goma cache directory
~followup_annotations: @@@STEP_LOG_LINE@python.inline@    print "%s exists but is not a dir" % path@@@

cmd:
import shutil
import sys
shutil.copy(sys.argv[1], sys.argv[2])
